title: Building error:  identifier "CUFFT_NOT_SUPPORTED" is undefined
body_html:
• OS: Linux (CentOS 7)
  • PyTorch version: a90aa5d
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): source
  • Python version: conda 3.6
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: CUDA7.5
  • GPU models and configuration: Tesla M40
  • GCC version (if compiling from source): gcc version 4.8.5

$grep CUFFT_NOT_SUPPORTED * -rn
aten/src/ATen/native/cuda/CuFFTUtils.h:51:    case CUFFT_NOT_SUPPORTED:
aten/src/ATen/native/cuda/CuFFTUtils.h:52:      return "CUFFT_NOT_SUPPORTED";
